articles.description: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre isn't due to launch into Xbox Game Pass until sometime in 2023, but we have already picked up the game's achievement list, and it looks like it will be quite the grind.
articles.content:
Update
:As we suspected, it appears that this is not the final achievement list for The Texas Chain Saw Massacre. In Twitter reply to Maka91, Gun CEO Wes Keltner pointed out that these achievements … [+7130 chars]
